resources.string: How can I scan a custom location?
You can scan on custom location by long tap on the map. If you start a new scan, the previous one will be interrupted if it\'s not yet completed
My alternative icons are blurred and messed up
Due to Nintendo\'s copyrights, we can\'t use stock Pokémon icons on our app. The original icons with original shapes will be blurred and filtered to avoid legal issues.
I have some problem using PokéMesh
We are always on top of our social pages to listen for any problems and try to solve them as fast as possible!
